@graph.caption: Honey Garlic Chicken Breast in a skillet, fresh off the stove

@graph.name: Honey Garlic Chicken Breast | RecipeTin Eats
@graph.description: You're just 12 minutes away from this Honey Garlic Chicken - juicy seared chicken breast smothered in the most incredible 5 ingredient Honey Garlic Sauce!

@graph.name: Nagi
@graph.description: I believe you can make great food with everyday ingredients even if you’re short on time and cost conscious. You just need to cook clever and get creative!

@graph.name: Honey Garlic Chicken Breast
@graph.description: Recipe video above. An incredible quick and easy way to serve up chicken breast - seared then simmered in the most amazing honey garlic sauce. Don't be deceived by the short ingredient list! It's absolutely worth the extra step of dusting the chicken with flour because it creates a crust for the sauce to cling to. BONUS: See notes for how to make this with any protein - beef, pork, lamb, prawns/shrimp, tofu!
recipeIngredient: 500g / 1 lb   chicken breast (, boneless and skinless (2 pieces))
3 1/2 tbsp  (50g)  unsalted butter ((or 2 1/2 tbsp olive oil))
1 1/2 tbsp apple cider vinegar ((or white or other clear vinegar))
1 tbsp soy sauce (, light or all purpose (Note 2))

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the breasts in half horizontally to create 4 steaks in total. Sprinkle each side with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the breasts in half horizontally to create 4 steaks in total. Sprinkle each side with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Place flour in a shallow dish. Coat chicken in flour and shake off excess.
recipeInstructions.name: Place flour in a shallow dish. Coat chicken in flour and shake off excess.

recipeInstructions.text: Melt most of the butter in a large skillet over high heat - hold back about 1 tsp for later.
recipeInstructions.name: Melt most of the butter in a large skillet over high heat - hold back about 1 tsp for later.

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken in skillet and cook for 2 - 3 minutes until golden. Turn and cook the other side for 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Place chicken in skillet and cook for 2 - 3 minutes until golden. Turn and cook the other side for 1 minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Turn heat down slightly to medium high.
recipeInstructions.name: Turn heat down slightly to medium high.

recipeInstructions.text: Make a bit of room in the pan and add garlic and top with remaining dab of butter. Stir garlic briefly once butter melts.
recipeInstructions.name: Make a bit of room in the pan and add garlic and top with remaining dab of butter. Stir garlic briefly once butter melts.

recipeInstructions.text: Add vinegar, soy sauce and honey. Stir / shake pan to combine. Bring sauce to simmer, then simmer for 1 minute or until slightly thickened.
recipeInstructions.name: Add vinegar, soy sauce and honey. Stir / shake pan to combine. Bring sauce to simmer, then simmer for 1 minute or until slightly thickened.

recipeInstructions.text: Turn chicken to coat in sauce. If the sauce gets too thick, add a touch of water and stir.
recipeInstructions.name: Turn chicken to coat in sauce. If the sauce gets too thick, add a touch of water and stir.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from stove immediately. Place chicken on plates and drizzle over remaining sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from stove immediately. Place chicken on plates and drizzle over remaining sauce.

@graph.keywords: Baked Chicken Breast, chicken breast recipe, honey chicken, Honey Garlic Chicken, sauce for chicken
